DESCRIPTION: A card that summons a creature into an empty orb slot. Will enter discard pile when sacrificed.
Cost that is paid by sacrificing a number of creatures.
Cost that is paid with Bones. 1 Bone is obtained when a creature is sacrificed or exhausted.
A subtype of creature. Certain cards can provide effects for specific Tribes.
Gains 50% Attack for each other Ant.
Counts as all creature Tribes.
Attacks inflict loss of HP instead.
Attacks two enemies.
Attacks three enemies.
At the start of turn, this become a better form or gain 20% stats.
Can pay blood costs 9 times before being sacrificed.
When sacrificed to pay Blood costs, this pays for 3 Blood.
When sacrificed, gain an additional 3 Bones.
At the end of the turn, gain 1 Bone.
When summoned, add a Rabbit to hand.
When summoned, put a card in your draw pile into your hand.
While this is in play, decrease enemy attack damage by 1.
When sacrificed, this is put into your hand instead of your discard pile. No longer gives Bones. Overrides Transient.
When summoned, add a copy of this into your hand with Transient and without Fecundity.
When killed, this is exhausted instead of being put into your discard pile. Overridden by Unkillable.
Sigils added to a creature card through outside sources.
Non sigil effects that trigger on summon.
Non sigil effects that trigger on sacrifice.
Non sigil effects that trigger at end of turn.
Summoned in the front.
No longer prevents damage.
Cannot be sacrificed for Blood costs.
Creatures prioritize targeted Monsters.
Totems give a given Sigil to creatures of a given tribe. New totem heads or bases overwrite the previous.
While this is on the field, gain 3 Thorns.
Attacks apply 1 Vulnerable.
While in a shop, you may right click to sell for gold.
Combine two creature cards by adding their stats and sigils onto one card.
Replace a creature with the second gaining the sigils of the first.
Prevent a certain amount of life loss. After the amount is prevented sacrifice this creature.
One creature of each tribe in your master deck. Each creature can only count towards a single Full Set. Amalgams can take the place of a single creature.
Random creature with 2 random Sigils upgraded based on total Blood cost of revealed cards.
When damaged and you don't have a full hand, add a Bee to your hand.
When summoned, apply Broken Egg to a all enemies. They deal 20% less damage and prevent the next time they take damage.
The first time this dies, restore up to 6 Health and move to the back.
When summoned, add a Worker Ant with Transient to your hand.
The first time this is summoned each combat, gain a random potion.
At end of turn, moves in a direction.
Attacks the enemy an additional time. Attacks a different enemy if Bifurcated.
Prevents the first time this takes damage.
Dies at the end of turn.
Gains 10 Attack per space away from the right side.
Gains 3 Attack per card in your hand.
Has Attack equal to that of the creature before this.
At start of combat, if you have 2 sets of each tribe in your master deck, hatch.
Gains 3 Attack and Heath for each set of each tribe in your master deck.
Gains Attack equal to double your bones.
Gains 6 Attack for each creature sacrificed for Blood costs this turn.
On death, gain 10% Attack and Health.
When Smithed, remove this from your deck and gain Dead Survivors, a relic that double upgrade stat gain.
Each time a creature dies, its Attack and Defense are reduced by 20%.
While this creature is in play, gain 1 Artifact.
Contains a Squirrel, a 1 Blood cost, a 2 Blood cost, and a Bone cost.
When drawn, replace this Sigil with a random new Sigil.
